attributes.action: Make March 26th a national holiday as “NHS day”
attributes.additional_details: Creating a national holiday is something only the government can do. It also has the resources to support the NHS and social care the enable a national day of support. This could include voluntary additional NI payments.
attributes.background: Create a new national holiday on the 26th March each year with special opportunities for all parts of the community to support the NHS and social care workers and recall the bravery and commitment of staff during the coronavirus pandemic.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303882

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
